org.mitre.provenance.client

Class AbstractProvenanceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.provenance.client.AbstractProvenanceClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalProvenanceClient, RESTProvenanceClient

    public abstract class AbstractProvenanceClient
extends Object
    This class defines the methods that all provenance clients must implement.
    Author:
    david

      • setUser

        public void setUser(User user)
        Modify the user object that will be used for all requests.
        Parameters:
        user - the new user to use for all subsequent requests.

      • report

        public abstract boolean report(ProvenanceCollection col)
                        throws ProvenanceClientException
        Report new provenance to the provenance store. This has the effect of creating new objects.
        Parameters:
        col - the collection to report
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if unsuccessful.
        Throws:
        ProvenanceClientException

      • getGraph

        public abstract ProvenanceCollection getGraph(String oid,
                                              TraversalSettings desc)
                                       throws ProvenanceClientException
        Fetch provenance from a store.
        Parameters:
        oid - the ID of the object to start from
        desc - a set of traversal settings describing how provenance should be discovered.
        Returns:
        a provenance collection
        Throws:
        ProvenanceClientException
        See Also:
        TraversalSettings

        Returns:

                                     throws ProvenanceClientException
        Search for provenance matching a certain set of metadata properties.
        Parameters:
